a.parent_id=#{parentId} AND a.visible = '1'
AND c.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT id, title, icon, path AS jump, id AS name, order_num AS orderNum FROM sys_menu_info WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY order_num ASC
SELECT id, path AS uri, title AS name, code AS permission, 'GET' AS method, type FROM sys_menu_info WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY order_num ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT c.id, c.path AS uri, c.title AS name, c.code AS permission, 'GET' AS method, 'jump' AS type FROM sys_role_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu_info c ON b.menu_id = c.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND c.visible = '1' AND c.type = 'menu' AND c.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY c.order_num ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT c.id FROM sys_role_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu_info c ON b.menu_id = c.id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} AND c.visible = '1' AND c.type = 'dirt' AND c.parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY c.order_num ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT id, title, code AS perms, parent_id AS parentId, icon, type AS menuType, false AS isCheck, false AS spread, visible, order_num AS orderNum, path AS href FROM sys_menu_info WHERE parent_id = #{parentId} ORDER BY order_num

SELECT DISTINCT a.id, a.title, a.code AS perms, a.parent_id AS parentId, icon, a.type AS menuType, false AS isCheck, false AS spread, a.visible, a.order_num AS orderNum, a.path AS href FROM sys_menu_info a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.id = b.menu_id LEFT JOIN sys_role_user c ON c.role_id = b.role_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND a.parent_id = #{parentId} AND a.visible = '1' ORDER BY order_num
SELECT code FROM sys_menu_info WHERE type = 'menu' UNION ALL SELECT code FROM sys_element_info

SELECT DISTINCT c.id, c.path AS uri, c.title AS name, c.code AS permission, 'GET' AS method, 'jump' AS type, IFNULL(d.title, '一级菜单') AS menu FROM sys_role_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu_info c ON b.menu_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu_info d ON c.parent_id = d.id WHERE c.visible = '1' AND c.type = 'menu' AND a.user_id = #{userId} UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT c.id, c.path AS uri, c.title AS name, c.code AS permission, c.method, c.type, IFNULL(d.title, '一级菜单') AS menu FROM sys_role_user a LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu b ON a.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_element_info c ON b.menu_id = c.id LEFT JOIN sys_menu_info d ON c.menu_id = d.id WHERE c.visible = '1' AND a.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT a.id, a.path AS uri, a.title AS name, a.code AS permission, 'GET' AS method, 'jump' AS type, IFNULL(b.title, 'FlyNext') AS menu FROM sys_menu_info a LEFT JOIN sys_menu_info b ON a.parent_id = b.id WHERE a.type = 'menu' AND a.path IS NOT NULL AND a.path NOT LIKE '/error/%' UNION ALL SELECT a.id, a.path AS uri, a.title AS name, a.code AS permission, 'GET' AS method, 'jump' AS type, b.title AS menu FROM sys_element_info a LEFT JOIN sys_menu_info b ON a.menu_id = b.id WHERE a.path != '/' UNION ALL SELECT a.id, a.href AS uri, a.title AS name, a.code AS permission, a.method, a.type, b.title AS menu FROM sys_element_info a LEFT JOIN sys_menu_info b ON a.menu_id = b.id WHERE a.href != '/'
